docs.text: FreEM corpora ¶ FreEM corpora distribute corpora and NLP models for various tasks related to Early Modern French (16 th -18 th c.), and especially. It is the result of a collaboration between: - Pedro Ortiz Suárez, Inria - Rachel Bawden, Inria - Benoît Sagot, Inria - Alexandre Bartz, Sorbonne Université - Philippe Gambette, Université Gustave Eiffel - Simon Gabay, Université de Genève You feel find on this website all the information about our work. For data and code, please have a look at our GitHub repo .
